title: Can I get banned on TikTok Live (not the video part but TikTok live) for playing music from my Spotify music premium account while streaming me playing games? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1 do you own the rights to the song? 2 Have you secured permission from the copyright. If you answer no to both of these questions. Then it is illegal to use it. Nuf said! Steve
